Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Mummy mask
Description: Mummy mask whose face was painted a bright yellow. A headband with a solar disc was painted on the forehead. On the top of the head, a winged scarab (?) was depicted. There is no decoration on the strands of hair of the wig falling in front of the shoulder. The back is only decorated with the headband and the knot therein, shaped like a sa sign (''protection'').
